H0.text: In 2014 Russia closed branches of what global brand amidst East-West sanction. Starbucks

H1.text: In 2014 Russia closed branches of what global brand amidst East-West sanction. Coca-Cola

H3.text: In 2014 Russia closed branches of what global brand amidst East-West sanction. McD

A4.text: Starbucks announced closure of all outlets in Russia in May 2022.
